typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item as string,
		name as string,
		{WT/QTY} as string,
		price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GreenSource
source(output(
		SKey as integer,
		item as string,
		name as string,
		WT_QT as string,
		price as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> vegfrtSqlTable
GreenSource derive(isActive = 1) ~> AddingIsActive
vegfrtSqlTable select(mapColumn(
		SKey,
		itemSQL = item,
		nameSQL = name,
		WT_QTSQL = WT_QT,
		priceSQL = price
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenamedColumns
GreenSource, RenamedColumns lookup(item == itemSQL,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
AddingIsActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SKey as integer,
		item as string,
		name as string,
		WT_QT as string,
		price as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
